name: VC Dominator Userbot
description: A modern Pyrogram-based Telegram userbot for VC, audio amplification, and group moderation.

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID (integer, get from https://my.telegram.org/)

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API HASH (get from https://my.telegram.org/)

SECONDARY_OWNER_ID.description: Your secondary owner Telegram user ID (as string)

SUDO_IDS.description: A Python list of SUDO user IDs (e.g. ["1234","5678"])
